IRPact_modellierung.distributions

Class BivariateDistribution

  • java.lang.Object
    • IRPact_modellierung.distributions.Distribution
      • IRPact_modellierung.distributions.MultivariateDistribution
        • IRPact_modellierung.distributions.BivariateDistribution

  • public abstract class BivariateDistribution
extends MultivariateDistribution
    A Bivariate distribution is the abstraction of a distribution in two variables. It is the special case of a multivariate distribution with dim=2
